label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_018
content:
## 2024-09-19 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 13766366
- Unique source IPs: 1404
- Unique destination IPs: 5100
- Average flow duration (sec): 31.8
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 82.6
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 12.2
- ICMP percentage: 2.0
- Long lived flows greater than 1 hour: 67
- East-West traffic percentage: 58.7

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 2822692
- Unique domains: 76759
- NXDOMAIN responses: 7452
- DGA suspected domains: 1
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 1513
- Average response time (ms): 3.9
- Cache hit percentage: 82.4
- TXT record queries: 797
- PTR queries: 7504

### Ids Ips Hits
- Total alerts: 743
- Blocked by IPS: 187
- Signature matches: 655
- Anomaly detections: 17
- Severity critical: 1
- Severity high: 6
- Severity medium: 31
- Severity low: 459
- Top signatures:
  - ET POLICY curl User-Agent Outbound
  - ET WEB_SERVER SQL Injection Attempt
  - ET SCAN Nmap SYN Scan
- False positive rate percentage: 16.1

### Bandwidth Utilization
- WAN inbound average (Gbps): 2.86
- WAN outbound average (Gbps): 3.34
- WAN peak (Gbps): 7.36
- LAN core utilization percentage: 56.3
- DMZ utilization percentage: 30.8
- VPN concentrator sessions: 179
- VPN bandwidth (Gbps): 2.19
- Top talker IP: 10.33.177.114
- Top talker bytes (GB): 17.1

### Bgp Changes
- Prefix announcements: 2
- Prefix withdrawals: 2
- AS path changes: 4
- Route flaps: 2
- Peer sessions established: 4
- Peer sessions down: 0
- Max prefix warnings: 1
- Communities changed: 0

### Tls Cert Transparency
- CT logs monitored: 6
- New entries for organization domains: 4
- Suspicious issuances: 0
- Expired certificates in use: 1
- TLS 1.0 connections: 14
- TLS 1.1 connections: 15
- TLS 1.2 connections: 76018
- TLS 1.3 connections: 191134
- Weak cipher usage: 4

### Infrastructure
#### netflow-collector-01
- CPU percentage: 62
- Memory percentage: 66
- Disk percentage: 67
#### dns-resolver-01
- CPU percentage: 29
- Memory percentage: 53
- Cache size (GB): 3.1
#### ids-sensor-01
- CPU percentage: 50
- Memory percentage: 62
- PPS: 97478
#### ids-sensor-02
- CPU percentage: 42
- Memory percentage: 64
- PPS: 118147
#### border-router-01
- CPU percentage: 32
- Memory percentage: 50
- Interface errors: 4

### Events
- DNS: DGA-suspected domain dev-cluster-03 — false positive
- BGP route change: AS path prepend from ISP-A — normal maintenance

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-19. 13766366 flows analyzed. 2822692 DNS queries. 743 IDS alerts (1 critical, 6 high). WAN avg 2.86/3.34 Gbps in/out. 2 BGP announcements.
